summary: The diff implements most PWA requirements. REQ-25, REQ-27, REQ-29 are well-covered. REQ-28 appears addressed via existing admin functionality. The main issue is REQ-26: the manifest.json references icon files with '.dim_192x192.png' and '.dim_512x512.png' suffixes rather than the required plain 'nurpay-icon-192.png' and 'nurpay-icon-512.png' filenames.

missing_requirements.requirement: Icon files must be at frontend/public/assets/generated/nurpay-icon-192.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/nurpay-icon-512.png, and manifest.json must reference these exact filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest.json references '/assets/generated/nurpay-icon-192.dim_192x192.png' and '/assets/generated/nurpay-icon-512.dim_512x512.png' instead of the required '/assets/generated/nurpay-icon-192.png' and '/assets/generated/nurpay-icon-512.png'. The acceptance criteria explicitly require the plain .png filenames without dimension suffixes.

hallucinated_features.description: The InstallBanner uses a Smartphone icon as the primary banner icon instead of the requested Download icon.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-27 specifies the banner should display a download icon, but the implementation uses a Smartphone icon in the left badge area. A Download icon is used only on the Install button itself.
